website_summaries.verdict: The iBed in a Box is a comfortable, compact bed and, for the price, a budget-conscious choice for a guest bed.
pros: The iBed in a Box requires no assembly and is comfortable
It has a foam cushion with spring supports
It sets up quickly and fits underneath a bed or in a closet in a small space
cons: Users have said the locking mechanism needs work, and it should be folded carefully to avoid pinch points

customer_reviews.title: Useful guest bed for grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews said how comfortable this bed was and I wouldn't say it is real comfortable, but it does work well for children. It is easy to get out and set up, but be aware that it is large and needs a closet or someplace large to store it when it is folded up and not in use. Once the mattress pad relaxes and is fluffier it is very hard to get the bed to fold back up and get the hook to keep it in place. I anticipate the hook breaking and needing to use a bungee cord to keep it together.
customer_reviews.author: melee3

customer_reviews.title: I just love this hideaway bed
customer_reviews.text: I just love this hideaway bed. Lightweight and easy to carry even with my sometimes annoying back issues. I was amazed how sturdy the bed is and how comfortable it is. Only had it a few weeks now and a few quest remarked about how impressed they were with this cot. They liked being on a cot rather than a blow up that is on the floor. I started to use it out in my 3 season room when the nights are cool ( I use to camp a lot in my younger days). Waking up to mother nature is better then an alarm clock. That is how comfortable it is and I am 61 years of age.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Jo

customer_reviews.title: This bed and the fitting sheets for it work fine in my Toyota Sienna
customer_reviews.text: This bed and the fitting sheets for it work fine in my Toyota Sienna. A comfortable sleep, and the bed can be easily lifted up in the middle and stowed back of the front seats if you need to haul cargo or put the third row seats up for carrying passengers. The bed is easily secured with heavy duty bungees.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood Anderson

customer_reviews.title: certainly better than a blowup air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect for a guest bed in my 650sqft apartment. It slides right under my bed rails for storage. The mattress is easy to fit a twin sheet to and all my guests have mentioned how much they loved it. It’s certainly better than a blowup air mattress. I have slept on it a few nights shortly after it arrived so I knew how it felt before offering it to my friends & family and I must say as a back sleeper, I had absolutely no issues. I think a side sleeper will obviously notice it’s more stiff than a pillow top. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Errol Lepianka

customer_reviews.title: Single folding bed
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for small spaces when you need an extra bed or big spaces where you have plenty of storage. This has a very small footprint when closed. I have a studio apt and I tuck it behind the headboard of my queen bed, when I don't need it for company. Really comfortable. My cousin is 6'2 and slept just fine. Not an issue! My friend is 5'2 and it worked just as well for her. Great purchase it has lasted 4 years in perfect shape!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meggrr

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I searched for the most comfortable cot without it being a typical rollaway bed. I was skeptical at first because the mattress was only 2" thick, but my daughter slept on this while visiting us for 4 nights and said it was great and comfortable without the hard to lay on middle slat that always catches your back bone. I highly recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Good value, Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Slept for many months on this bed, held up well and was surprisingly comfortable, though a bit small for a tall person. Great for a weekend guest but don't recommend long term use, though it'll work in a pinch. Sometimes the pad slips and you end up against the cold metal edge/springs. For the amount I used the bed it has held up very well, and the dogs would always want to sleep on it when I wasn't. It would fold up and store easily in a closet or under a bed.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is true that the cot is a little difficult to completely unfold due to the spring action, but it is safe and very comfortable. I store it under my guest bed and use it when my young granddaughter comes for an "overnight". I took it with me to visit a friend who did not have a guest bed and slept on it myself for several nights. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S

customer_reviews.title: Better than an air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible! I was shopping around for an air mattress but I really wanted something more substantial for my guests. My research had pretty much dead ended when I came across the iBed. I wasn't sure what to expect, but I was extremely happy with the size and sturdiness of the product. My guests have all said how comfortable they were and no pains or aches in the morning. This was a great investment and one that I will be keeping around! **I've had this bed for over a year, and I've moved twice in that time. Besides a few moving scratches, the bed is still in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaJ

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable. Only knock on it is when you open ...
customer_reviews.text: Compact bed for occasional use. Surprisingly comfortable. Only knock on it is when you open it up once you'll never fold it back again with the mattress in it. That being said both are compact enough to store separately and they take up very little room when you store them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great guest bed option
customer_reviews.text: This cot it easy to set up and surprisingly comfortable, better than an air mattress with less moving around when the occupant turns over, gets in and out of bed. It is slightly smaller than a standard twin size bed but our guest, 5'7", 140 lbs, slept there for a week with no complaints. Comes with a handy storage sack.
customer_reviews.author: alm711

customer_reviews.title: But this bed is awesome. It folds easily and very flat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on my friends recommendation. I have tried other foldable beds. They were extremely uncomfortable. Recently we slept in a hotel and the kids slept on a rollaway bed. There was a sunken hole in the middle. But this bed is awesome. It folds easily and very flat. Tucked it under my sons bed. Wirh zippered cover so no dust. Mattress is firm but no sink holes anywhere. I love it for extra kids sleeping over.
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: best cot-style bed
customer_reviews.text: Super support, zero sag... I found the bed a bit too firm and added an inch-thick memory foam pad on top, which solved that issue. I wish it were even an inch or so higher off the ground, but I guess making the frame larger would add more weight... really well-made and the legs lock nicely in place; secure set-up.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Sowell

customer_reviews.title: Nice spare bed and best thing is the legs lock ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice spare bed and best thing is the legs lock so not have to worry about that. Had a competitor's product before and everytime you turned over the legs had a tendency to fall out from under it. Ended up having to use little step stools under it to keep it from falling but this one won't do that. The mattress not overly thick but it is comfy because the support underneath is not metal it is fabric. Good for use where space it tight too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cot in November 2014 and it has been in frequent use since that time. I love It! When I bought it, it did did not come with a storage bag. I recently contacted the manufacturer to see if I could purchase a bag separately. They were very accommodating. I was extremely impressed with their customer service. The cot is not only a very functional quality product, their customer service department is great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Beynon

customer_reviews.title: This bed is great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to close in the morning and, with the zippered cover, easy to store under the bed. One of our guests chose to sleep on this portable bed instead of our guest room bed and told us he was going to buy one for himself when he got back home. I would recommend this to anyone who needs an extra bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solves a problem
customer_reviews.text: I needed to have a sleeping "spot" for just one night in my home. I have the space, just not the bed. I bought this folding bed with a mattress and it filled my need. It is easy to set up, affords a firm comfortable sleep, doesn't take a lot of room and is easy to store. I can store it in a closet easily. This bed fills the bill..
customer_reviews.author: MAMc

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it once was
customer_reviews.text: Bought one last year, ordered another this year--first one much better. They went cheap on the mattress, only as thick as a candy bar, nothing like the cushy three-inch thick mattress of the first one plus it smells bad and leaves a film on the hands. It says not to wash it, but a Tide pod on gentle in cold water turned wrong-side-out had no problems. This one also has no wheels. The cost was less, but I'd have paid the original price again for the old one.
customer_reviews.author: OntChee

customer_reviews.title: The folding action is good, but you really need to be careful not ...
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have around. The folding action is good, but you really need to be careful not to pinch yourself or the carpet when opening the unit. Be careful not to lose the locking plastic piece or it won't store totally compressed. Lastly, remember to lock the legs in place when you put it down or you may find that side of the bed will collapse when under weight.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonVoyager

customer_reviews.title: It is much better then the aero bed I had been using
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on it when I have company over. It is much better then the aero bed I had been using. I actually sleep well and have not had any issues with it at all. I am over 6' tall and have not been on the right side of the scale for some time now.
customer_reviews.author: Semaj

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I expected but that makes it solid. Folded, it is as compact as can be - the storage bag makes it easy to put away. It's very comfortable and the height is good; looks great. fwiw, way better than a camping cot - which typically has a slightly smaller footprint. But if space isn't an absolute deal breaker, this is superior.
customer_reviews.author: jane doe

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery! Received bed the day after I ordered it and only paid ground shipping! The bed was very easy to set up and it fits perfectly under my Queen sized bed for storage. I tested out the ibed for a couple minutes and it felt a lot more comfortable than I thought it would. I only wish it was a tad bit longer. I am 5'11 and my feet hang over just a bit off the bed. The foam mattress provides enough padding to not feel the cot material and springs. I have a guest that will be sleeping on the iBed this weekend. I will report back with updates regarding comfortability.
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Good Frame but Weak Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bed specifically for the frame so everything I needed was comfortable but the mattress pad they supply you with is very stiff to sleep on, but if you use a small memory foam mattress pad it’s perfect. It’s a good length and width for me (I’m 5’2).
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: What I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love that it came with its own carrying case but wish it had a thicker mattress. This product is very simple to put up and take down as well as store away. Note that the pricing is okay too.
customer_reviews.author: Joel4u

customer_reviews.title: Well impressed
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and compact. We have bought two and a queen mattress topper so that a couple can stay over. They're very comfortable, queen doesn't quite fit across the entire frame but is good for bridging the distance between the two mattresses. We will be using ratchet straps to secure them metal frames together. I bought a valance to hide the frames and the bed looks like a headboardless queen bed. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BED FOR CONTINUOUS USE - TRUST THE SLEEP DEPRIVED MOTHER WHO HAS HER GUEST BED IN BABY'S NURSERY
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get your son to sleep in his own room without having to walk sleep deprived at 4 am for feeding, get yourself this comfy bed (I did buy a mattress foam on top) and sleep like a queen... I use it every day sometimes more than 6 hours and it has been I think more than 6 months and I do not have any complaints... I sleep like a queen. Now, hubby uses it too when I decide to fall sleep with my son who is 10 months old and well my hubby moves so he goes to sleep on the baby's room to avoid kicking me or him.
customer_reviews.author: Busylawstudentmom

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a ski weekend and it served its purpose. I wouldn't call it comfortable, nor would I say it's uncomfortable. It's definitely firm, I layered some blankets on top of the mattress and it seemed to work. The best thing about this bed was that it fit in the trunk of my Mitsubishi Lancer. Before I sleep on this again I am probably going to look for a foam mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: kev994

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and used looking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these beds . One looks OK and the other was rusted and looks used I was very upset with the product . I will be sending the one bed back as for the quality I don't know yet because I just received them today .
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great Cot.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this when my father was staying with us for a few months. He took my 6 year olds room and my 6 year old moved into our bedroom. He used it for 3 months and said it was very comfortable. Folds up nicely and easy to use. I have slept in it too and it's comfortable. Will take it camping.
customer_reviews.author: Pantea M.

customer_reviews.title: Surprise guests welcome.
customer_reviews.text: We're pleased with it. It's easy to use, only a little scary to pop open, and fairly comfortable as is. To up the comfort factor I use a thick mattress topper on it. Now even my "princess and the pea" kid will use it as needed if we have guests. Stores under my son's regular bed. Handy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Just took this right out of the box last night and set it up because of extra houseguest and it is fantastic! So pleased with my
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just took this right out of the box last night and set it up because of extra houseguest and it is fantastic! So pleased with my purchase! I slept on it and gave up my bedroom and in fact my two dogs slept with me! And we all slept great ! Could not feel any hard bars under my back as with other cots! Also easy to store,very slim design. Purchase this one for extra guest bed and you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: G.MA

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable even for large adult.
customer_reviews.text: These cots are super! I finally gave up on air mattresses and kicked them to the curb. These look and make up like single beds but fold up and fit under the bed. Very easy to set up and take down. Surprisingly comfortable even for large adult. For the price, they are super amazing. I bought two and am very happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: ... living with me temporarily and it seems to be pretty comfy. I chose it based on all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister who will be living with me temporarily and it seems to be pretty comfy. I chose it based on all the good reviews from those that used it for more than a few days. It was super easy to set up and comes in a handy carrying case and will be great for guests dodwn the road and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri T.

customer_reviews.title: The bed arrived promptly and was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The bed arrived promptly and was easy to set up. It is as advertised and my son, about 160 pounds in weight, slept on it for 6 nights comfortably. I did add a little cushioning with a 1 inch memory foam pad, perhaps more for my peace of mind than his comfort. The seller was very prompt in assuring me of their desire that I would be completely satisfied with the iBed in a Box and as an 85 year old lady customer, I am.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Horse lover

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfortable. I bought it for my grandkids to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprise how well made this bed is. It is so comfortable. I bought it for my grandkids to sleep on and was surprise how big and light it was. Easy to store and put together. I may end of buying another one for company to sleep in.
customer_reviews.author: maribeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solution for extra guests
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these iBeds via the Amazon Warehouse and am SO HAPPY with the purchase and the price. I had been watching these iBeds come and go from inventory, and noticed the price fluctuation from under $100 to well past $200. These are super easy to put together and so compact they fit under a bed or, in my case, tuck away in my closet. Such an easy perk and solution for drop in guests, I highly recommend given their comfort and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Winebyrd

customer_reviews.title: Growing soccer player
customer_reviews.text: My grandson comes on weekend to visit. We surprise him with hideaway guest bed. He a soccer player in high school. He very pleased. He say it support his back and he fits 5ft 10 and still growing. So easy to set up, better than air mattress. Love the storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS !
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS... Not comfortable, heavy, not easy to setup and very expensive comparing to similar products. Mine also was defective and the seller don’t want to send prepaid shipping label to send it back so I filed a claim with Amazon this morning.
customer_reviews.author: BEIRUT ENTERTAINMENT

customer_reviews.title: But I can't believe how comfortable this is
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical purchasing this because the mattress looks-and is-so thin. But I can't believe how comfortable this is! VERY happy with this purchase and it's also very easy to set up, break down, and store!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reedy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So pleasantly surprised by this bed! Even more impressed that it came with a zippered carry case....didn't know that! It has a springy feel, unlike a traditional cot. We put a folded fleece blanket on top of the thin mattress for a thicker feel, then tucked a twin sheet around the edges, and it was great! More comfy than an air mattress!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, we have been using this for over a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, we have been using this for over a week now as our primary bed and it is working great. My husband is actually getting proper rest now. This seems very sturdy, holds his weight and is very comfortable and easy to set up. I will update again in a month or so once we see of it is still holding up as it should.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: but that's just fine with me
customer_reviews.text: After buying one to keep at my son's apartment for when I visit, I got a second for my condo for when the granddaughter spends the night. I do add some extra cush to the mattress, but that's just fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: GrammyMurph

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little "firm"
customer_reviews.text: This bed comes in a zippered storage bag and is convenient to store under a bed. It's fairly comfortable, but it is a little on the "firm" side. We use a folded comforter under the mattress that comes with it to make it more comfortable. It's easy to set up and take down and it's pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: KIM H BARNES

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I did purchase an additional 3" mattress, but I have a bad back. Very convenient and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: better than a blow up mattress
customer_reviews.text: Used it to sleep a 180lb 5'9 kid for 2 weeks and was perfect! better than our blow up mattress, easier to stow and will last for a long time (our blow mattresses always get punctured so we assume well get 4-5 uses before we have to toss - the hideaway bed doesnt have that issue so should last for a very long time)
customer_reviews.author: Wavehuntress

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice X-tra Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, securely packaged and came without a scratch! Has zippered cover and really does fold to fit under a bed! It is about 25 lbs. so two people had to carry it upstairs, mainly for balance. Once in the room, very easy to set up and take down. The mattress is very nice and well made. The frame is sturdy and the springs are quality. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn54

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. lightweight and stores nicely. We purchased this bed for a family member who is staying with us for about 3 months. So far they have been sleeping on it for over a month and said it is really comfortable and better than the aerobed we had previously. Mainly because it is elevated off the ground. We just use regular twin sheets on the mattress and they seem to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: AngelaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Say YES!
customer_reviews.text: Love love this bed! I own a b&b and needed affordable extra cots for kids to stay in. This bed was so amazing I ended up with 4 of them! Even adults say they are most comfortable! My brother prefers to sleep on it and he's a big tall guy! The price is right and the bed is fabulous! No issues, got the first one over a year ago'
customer_reviews.author: Hairburnerr

customer_reviews.title: Love the polka dotted mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and very cute! I have a small and I mean small bedroom in my house and finding a guest bed proved challenging. This bed fit right in and folds up so small (with its own bag) that I love it. Now I can have guests over without a ton of trouble and the room and easily convert back to my office with they are gone.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Saloiye

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This cot is extremely comfortable. There's no bars poking you; the mesh body is all that comes in contact with the mattress. It's as light and portable as the seller claims. It sets up and disassembles in less than a minute. It's sturdy and stable, too; and so compact that I've got it stored behind the couch.
customer_reviews.author: ThePondWitch

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfortable for such a thin mattress. When folded it's still a bit heavy and requires some space to store, but it's solid and provides guests with a good night's sleep, so yeah, it's worth the hundred-or-so bucks, totally.
customer_reviews.author: gmtenor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for an overnight guest and for traveling. Easier than an airbed and very comfortable. Folds neatly and has a cover for easy storage without being over bulky.
customer_reviews.author: SWBDBM

customer_reviews.title: dont let some of the reviews fool you
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed to use for one of our kids on new years eve and since then have used it for sleep overs and as a pull out when one of the kids is sick. I have read review where people gave it 1 or 2 stars because they are using it as a primary bed, dont let those bad reviews fool you this is well worth the money for 1 or 2 night sleeps and great for kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: KMB72

customer_reviews.title: I bought this bed so I can sleep comfortably at my grandkids house I had my doubts on ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed so I can sleep comfortably at my grandkids house I had my doubts on this bed because I way 189 pounds, but guess what it was very comfortable I am glad i purchase this bed now I'm definitely going to buy another for my home.:)
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: like "sleeping on the floor" level of stiffness even after ...
customer_reviews.text: Cot's springs are *incredibly* stiff, like "sleeping on the floor" level of stiffness even after many uses... So if you prefer a medium or soft sleeping cot then don't get this.
customer_reviews.author: Dd Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Quality Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this purchase. It IS truly 31 inches wide and 4.5 inches tall while folded up for easy storage, I am 5'10" 215lbs and can lay on my stomach to sleep. A full size bed is 54 inches, queen size bed is 60 inches wide so you do get more than half of a larger bed size. The bed frame is a little stiff as the middle hinged pieces like to stay in the folded position but with some minimal tugging, it snaps safely into place. When the end legs have the metal slide locked into place, the unit is very stable. No scratches or dents during shipping process. I believe my guests will enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: AthleticDiva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bed was shipped quickly and has come in handy for camping and over night guests.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and plenty wide for an adult unlike some of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and plenty wide for an adult unlike some of the cheaper ones. Has been slept on nightly by a 12 year old with no complaints. Siblings have ran and jummped on it and no issue with collapse or breakage. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Misty LoPresti

customer_reviews.title: ... topper and my guests have said it was very comfortable. The only complaint that I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: I added a 3 in memory foam topper and my guests have said it was very comfortable. The only complaint that I have is that the locking mechanism for the legs needs to be improved as the legs will collapse unexpectedly when you unfold the bed or move it around after it's been unfolded.
customer_reviews.author: jsdad

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the fact that it was so heavy. Watching the mini video, it looked much lighter, also the mattress is very thin. I bought another one to put on top of it. Setting up can be difficult for one person as it will snap back if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome guest bed, fits in the closet...
customer_reviews.text: I should have written this earlier! This bed was another wonderful purchase....I think I paid $120 for it; it is easy to use, comfortable, and inexpensive. I plan on buying one or two more. My daughter is moving into student housing and wants to take ours with her, for ease of relocating, ease of use, and smaller footprint in a small apartment. Plus, she can come borrow my "extras" for guests. My father bought one also, and loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: kt72664

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: This guest bed is easy to set up and take down, stores in its own bag in a small amount of space, and it's comfortable! I am very, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son to sleep on when guests come over and use his room. It is easy to set up, sturdy, and very comfy. When not in use I slide it under my queen bed and it is out of the way. I love it. My husband was concerned that over time the wire springs that attach the canvas to the bed frame would rip through the canvas, but we were happy to see there is a metal rod running on all sides of the canvas that will prevent the springs from doing this, great design.
customer_reviews.author: Bismillah

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied buyer!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived early and was exactly what I expected -- a great hideaway guest bed. We have not slept on it yet, but have set it up and laid on it. Its a nice guest cot that we can set up so someone doesn't have to sleep on the floor or on a blowup mattress that will deflate during the night. It would be perfect for a camping trip or for visiting grandkids, as it folds up neatly and has its own protective bag. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. It is built well but doesn't hold up a heavier person very well. The springs stretch too much if a person more than 140 lays on it. The foam pad is too thin and doesn't bounce back. Great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, pretty comfortable and folds up nice and slim ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for about a month now! I have 2 night waking sleep walking children so I put this near their bedrooms. It's sturdy, pretty comfortable and folds up nice and slim so it doesn't need a ton of space!
customer_reviews.author: jenD

customer_reviews.title: Scary to assemble, but ok once set up
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly as seamless to open as advertised! Be careful. The middle leg is very unstable and pops open as you try to turn the bed over. I had to open the two side legs first and then press down on the middle section to open it, and then pull the mattress out. Don't open this with kids around - and probably best with 2 adults to set up. But once it's set up, it is comfortable and functional. The other issue is that it is definitely is not as portable as indicated. It's pretty big when folded and not great to carry (vs. an aero). Probably better for occasional use in a home than on the go.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for a guest bed. Probably narrower than most people would prefer for an everyday bed, but I find it comfortable enough for everyday use. Too big & heavy for camping. I've used this nightly for approx 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Ann

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had family visiting from Europe and needed the extra beds for myself and some kids. The bed is very comfortable and easy to store. I was a bit unsure when reading some of the previous comments, but I am glad that I got them. Would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: 1Schwob

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the air mattress she slept on last year
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my visiting sister. Much better than the air mattress she slept on last year. Delivered promptly, easy to slip out of cover and set up and return to covering when she left. She thought it was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: linstro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: We use these for the extra three people that live with us seasonally. They hold up well after several Months and so we bought this one and it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Chris Yanke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome. We use it for guests visiting. I love that it slides under a bed when not being used. It sets up fairly quickly and easily. I ended using regular twin fitted sheets and they never fall of or slip. The bed is actually really comfortable. I have laid on the bed for short periods and was very comfortable. My sister uses it over night quite often and said its really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Caffrin

customer_reviews.title: Storage for this is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with its own case to keep the dust off, and slides right under the guest bed or stands in the closet for storage. It has worked great for that extra bed.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great
customer_reviews.text: The item is exactly as described. The service was great. The materials are of good quality. The mattresses are a wee bit hard however that is down to personal preference. We love the fact that they can easily be packed up and stored under the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but rusted....
customer_reviews.text: My guests said these beds were really comfortable. I was a little skeptical because the mattress is so thin but they seemed happy with them! They fold up well and are study. However, some of the edges are rusted...I don't know if it is how they stored them or what but it was a disappointment and I worry about how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: beattyjg

customer_reviews.title: Bed & mattress really quite comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bed & mattress really quite comfortable for a cot. Folds nice and flat, really not too difficult to fold out/put away. Step-by-step picture instructions easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: 2girlsandpup

customer_reviews.title: My guests have found this bed amazingly comfortable. It is very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My guests have found this bed amazingly comfortable. It is very sturdy, but you have to make sure you properly open it and set the legs. The foam is not very thick, but still very comfortable. Hides easily under the bed, which is great for my studio apartment, I can have guests sleeping in their own bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorely

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I've seen for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best bed I've seen for the price. I've seen the exact same bed in catalogs for about 40 dollar more. This is a very comfortable temporary bed. I read tons of reviews, and that's why I chose this one, and I made a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Wandalynette

customer_reviews.title: Injured my leg setting it up
customer_reviews.text: Injured my leg setting it up. The way it unfolds and snaps together is unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Family of Boys & one girl

customer_reviews.title: I can't actually believe how great this bed is
customer_reviews.text: I can't actually believe how great this bed is! The mattress looks thin, but is amazingly comfortable and the entire thing folds up and fits under my bed. This is one of the best purchases I've ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Cleary

customer_reviews.title: This is the best fold away bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fold away bed for the price ! Excellent quality it folds up so thin and secure and it's so comfortable for a night or two. I even used the foam mattress to make my grandsons playpen comfortable for him to sleep in by folding the foam mattress in half and pushing it secure into the playpen it fit snug and perfect he slept like a "baby". Hahaha (The sheet on the foam mattress comes off for washing !! It's perfect for me. I highly recommend this it's a Great product I'm going to get another one
customer_reviews.author: Chanah Gavin

customer_reviews.title: This is amazingly comfortable to sleep on and certainly easy to store
customer_reviews.text: This is amazingly comfortable to sleep on and certainly easy to store. You need to keep your thinking cap on when putting it away as the mattress isn't put where you expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: comfortable. The bag it came in already has a ...
customer_reviews.text: strong, durable, comfortable. The bag it came in already has a tear in it, but if that is the worst of it, i can deal with that. Very good bed! It was because of other people's ratings that I even chose this bed! VERY GOOD DEAL and shipped FAST!!!! Perfect for what i needed. Also it's not huge so it can fold up and slide under a bed if necessary for storage ! Great for guests or travel. Over Christmas I just brought the pad with us. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Better than an air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price but not the most comfortable for multiple nights sleep. It stows Away very easily and quality is def worth it. In my opinion still better than an air mattress
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn711

customer_reviews.title: Great extra bed
customer_reviews.text: This is such a handy extra bed for grandkids or guests. It sets up in a minute, feels sturdy, is light weight to move around, and is full twin size. I laid on it and it feels quite comfortable...much better than a sofa bed or an air mattress. The best thing is that it is so compact to store. I have a sleigh bed, very low, but this extra bed easily slides under it and out of the way. I liked it so much, I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Neal

customer_reviews.title: after further use i still suggest they put a lockking mechanism and the middle piece scratches the floor
customer_reviews.text: It is a great idea, but needs a little tweeking! The middle section does not lock into place, and tends to fold up way too easily. I would like to see a locking mechanism that keeps the mid section from folding up so easily. This also happens when trying to put the Mattress back on the underside to fold away. Otherwise it is nice and sturdy and a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: someone in Nash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little guest bed
customer_reviews.text: Great little cot. Comes with a zippered canvas-like bag with a handle which makes it easy to carry and store. I used a quilted cot mattress cover and a fleece blanket under the mattress cover for added cushion. I'm 5'4", 145lbs and slept comfortably one night on this cot with room to spare. For heavier weights, I would add some additional cushion (i.e. egg crate foam pad or something similar). For kids its perfect; the mattress pad reminds me of the pads used in play pens.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Well made bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! My 6'2 nephew slept on the bed Christmas Eve. He said it was really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mar50

customer_reviews.title: Great stowaway bed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bed for use in our nursery for those nights when sleeping alongside the newborn is the only sleep we can get. Very comfortable and easy to set-up, ready to go right out of the box, and we've both slept great on it, or as well as one can when listening intently for any needs from a newborn baby. We would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a comfortable but easy to stow bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Too short for anyone over 5'10"
customer_reviews.text: Great space saver but too short for tall guests! Also major finger pinching design the way kegs fold out, careful!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Bed would have been good, but I bought one that was not new
customer_reviews.text: Bed would have been good , but I bought one that was not new . IT was suppose to be Good ! , box could be damaged , but instead the bed leg was bent making the frame not line up and lock . The box wasn't damaged , and cot was used . Returned should have just bought new (Always)
customer_reviews.author: Msdionneh12

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of setting this up and taking it down. It is also very comfortable. I am awaiting some memory foam to add to it so when I put sheets on it it will be thicker. Only adults would appreciate this, but for a comfortable bed for an adult, it is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: dnsgilbert

customer_reviews.title: Nice full length cot .
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store, set up and keep in a closet .
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: For what we need it will be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have said.. the hinge in the center can be "pinchy" when setting it up. So just use common sense and be careful. Looks to be sturdy , well made and will work for what we need it for ! Good price and solid steel frame.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.  In N.J.

customer_reviews.title: great space saver better than a rollaway for lack of storage space
customer_reviews.text: Just as it says, it's wonderful, easy to set up, comfortable, and does slide under the bed. The mattress pad takes a bit to put inside, you have to slide it over the leg braces, but once you figure it out, it's easy. I got the sheets and mattress pad too, and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: A little bulky to put up because it does not stay locked well until it is up but overall I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have a child (5'10") staying with us for a while and I bought this bed. He said it was ok, but his feet hung over a little. My son who is 5'3" loves it and says he sleeps very well on it. A little bulky to put up because it does not stay locked well until it is up but overall I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the folding bed. Very comfortable. I'm heavy set, slept well, very sturdy. Good price. My Dad also tried out the bed and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: I love this guest cot
customer_reviews.text: I love this guest cot .Very easy to open, light weight and very comfortable .I tried it out myself .Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed
customer_reviews.text: Agree with everyone who gave this a thumbs up. Compact, comfortable, sturdy and reasonably priced. Did not experience the finger pinching that others warned about - thanks for the heads up! :o) Already considering purchasing another one for overflow guests.
customer_reviews.author: NicholsInTheBurg

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and surprisingly comfortable. I'm a small person, and this bed is big enough for me. It maybe small for a tall person.
customer_reviews.author: tcn

product_meta.title: SpaceMaster iBED Cot Size Hideaway Folding Cot Camping Bed with 2 Inch Foam Folding Mattress and Carry Case Under Bed Storage Bag, Black and White
product_meta.description: Your guests will feel like they are sleeping in a 5 star hotel bed. Forget the pullout couch. This space saving comfortable bed is easier to store than a rollaway bed. Thousands of satisfied customers have been amazed at how well they sleep on an iBED from SpaceMasters guest bed collection. Portable folding cot provides better deep sleep and relaxation, is more reliable, and quicker to set up than air mattresses, convertible sofa bed sleeper, rolling bed, murphy bed, pull out couch or futon. Built from a sturdy steel frame, iBED portable sleeper cots will delight guests for years to come. Comfortable 2" mattress foam sits 17" off the ground, portable folding bed supported by a flexible mesh that contours to the body without any uncomfortable bars. Portable, lightweight, and easy to store under sofa, under couch, saving space in attic, garage, crawl space, basement, hunting cabin, lodge, car back seat, trunk storage, trucker bed, pickup truck bed, camper van, under bunk bed or car bed. Over 6 feet long and 2 1/2 feet wide, great for kids and adults up to 350 lbs weight capacity. Bundle includes bonus space saver storage bag. SpaceMaster foldable space saving comfy bed measures 74.5" L x 31.5" W x 17" H when fully set up. Great as an RV bed, hunting cot, travel bed, guest cottage bed, air bnb, bed and breakfast, or vacation resort temporary bed. Easy to hide under beds. Sleep well. Legs lock for safety and stability. Space saving design hideaway bed rigorously tested to the highest standard. Feels just right, medium firmness is not too firm and not too soft. No assembly required. Be amazed at how well you sleep on new cot size guest beds. Black colored mattress cover with white polka dots. Hide away carry bag travel case included.
feature_bullets: Raised folding bed set with luxury mattress, more comfortable than air mattress and sleeping bag
Fold portable bed to 5", store in closet, under twin bed frame, modern trundle bed alternative
Instant setup, comfortable space saving hideaway bed camping cot requires no assembly or tools
Beds size: 74.5" long x 31.5" wide x 17" tall, fold bed in a box set to: 31.5" x 38" x 5" thick
Strong durable steel platform bed frame, supports adults up to 350 pounds for a perfect nights sleep

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars580 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
